channel.title: Agile on Seven steps
channel.description: Recent content in Agile on Seven steps

item.title: The value of estimates for a team
item.description: What this entry is and is not about Why talk about estimating at all This entry talks about estimates in a relatively perfect world. This entry does not talk about problems that teams run into when dealing with estimates in a world where estimates are often misunderstood and where parties try to pile up additional meanings and metrics to estimates. Estimating work to be done before it is done. Great if you know what the work is.
